00145 int nfs_Rename( nfs_arg_t               * parg    /* IN  */,
00146                 exportlist_t            * pexport /* IN  */,
00147                 fsal_op_context_t             * pcontext   /* IN  */,
00148                 cache_inode_client_t    * pclient /* IN  */,
00149                 hash_table_t            * ht      /* INOUT */,
00150                 struct svc_req          * preq    /* IN  */,
00151                  nfs_res_t              * pres    /* OUT */ ) 
00152 {
00153         static char     funcName[] = "nfs_Rename";
00154 
00155   char                    * str_entry_name = NULL    ;
00156   fsal_name_t               entry_name               ;
00157   char                    * str_new_entry_name = NULL;
00158   fsal_name_t               new_entry_name           ;
00159   cache_entry_t           * pentry            = NULL ;
00160   cache_entry_t           * new_pentry        = NULL ;
00161   cache_entry_t           * parent_pentry     = NULL ;
00162   cache_entry_t           * new_parent_pentry = NULL ;
00163   cache_entry_t           * should_not_exists = NULL ;
00164   cache_entry_t           * should_exists     = NULL ;
00165   cache_inode_status_t      cache_status             ;
00166   int                       rc                       ;
00167   fsal_attrib_list_t      * ppre_attr                ;
00168   fsal_attrib_list_t        pre_attr                 ;
00169   fsal_attrib_list_t      * pnew_pre_attr            ;
00170   fsal_attrib_list_t        new_attr                 ;
00171   fsal_attrib_list_t        new_parent_attr          ;
00172   fsal_attrib_list_t        attr                     ;
00173   fsal_attrib_list_t        tst_attr                 ;
00174   cache_inode_file_type_t   parent_filetype          ;
00175   cache_inode_file_type_t   new_parent_filetype      ;     
00176 
00177         if( preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3 )
00178         {
00179                 /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00180                 pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resfail.fromdir_wcc.before.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00181                 pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resfail.fromdir_wcc.after.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00182                 pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resfail.todir_wcc.before.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00183                 pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resfail.todir_wcc.after.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00184                 ppre_attr = NULL;
00185                 pnew_pre_attr = NULL;
00186         }
00187   
00188         /* Convert fromdir file handle into a cache_entry */
00189   if( ( parent_pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers,
00190                                             &(parg->arg_rename2.from.dir),
00191                                             &(parg->arg_rename3.from.dir),
00192                                             NULL, 
00193                                             &(pres->res_dirop2.status),
00194                                             &(pres->res_create3.status),
00195                                             NULL, 
00196                                             &pre_attr,
00197                                             pcontext, 
00198                                             pclient,
00199                                             ht, 
00200                                             &rc ) ) == NULL )
00201     {
00202       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00203       return rc ;
00204     }      
00205 
00206   
00207         /* Convert todir file handle into a cache_entry */
00208   if( ( new_parent_pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers,
00209                                                 &(parg->arg_rename2.to.dir),
00210                                                 &(parg->arg_rename3.to.dir),
00211                                                 NULL,
00212                                                 &(pres->res_dirop2.status),
00213                                                 &(pres->res_create3.status),
00214                                                 NULL, 
00215                                                 &new_parent_attr, 
00216                                                 pcontext, 
00217                                                 pclient, 
00218                                                 ht, 
00219                                                 &rc ) ) == NULL )
00220     {
00221       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00222       return rc ;
00223     }     
00224 
00225   /* get the attr pointers */
00226   ppre_attr = &pre_attr ;
00227   pnew_pre_attr = &new_parent_attr ;
00228   
00229   /* Get the filetypes */
00230   parent_filetype     = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( pre_attr.type )     ;
00231   new_parent_filetype = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( new_parent_attr.type ) ;
00232   
00233         /*
00234          * Sanity checks: we must manage directories
00235          */
00236   if( ( parent_filetype != DIR_BEGINNING &&  parent_filetype != DIR_CONTINUE  ) ||
00237       ( new_parent_filetype != DIR_BEGINNING &&  new_parent_filetype != DIR_CONTINUE  ) )
00238         {
00239                 switch (preq->rq_vers)
00240                 {
00241                 case NFS_V2:
00242       pres->res_stat2 = NFSERR_NOTDIR;
00243       break;
00244       
00245     case NFS_V3:
00246       pres->res_rename3.status = NFS3ERR_NOTDIR;
00247       break;
00248                 }
00249     
00250                 return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00251         }
00252   
00253   switch (preq->rq_vers)
00254     {
00255     case NFS_V2:
00256                         str_entry_name = parg->arg_rename2.from.name;
00257                         str_new_entry_name = parg->arg_rename2.to.name;
00258                         break;
00259 
00260     case NFS_V3:
00261                         str_entry_name = parg->arg_rename3.from.name;
00262                         str_new_entry_name = parg->arg_rename3.to.name;
00263                         break;
00264     }
00265 
00266         pentry = new_pentry = NULL;
00267 
00268         if( str_entry_name == NULL                                                                     || 
00269       strlen( str_entry_name ) == 0                                                              ||
00270             str_new_entry_name == NULL                                                                 || 
00271       strlen( str_new_entry_name ) == 0                                                          ||
00272       FSAL_IS_ERROR( FSAL_str2name( str_entry_name, FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN, &entry_name ) )           ||
00273       FSAL_IS_ERROR( FSAL_str2name( str_new_entry_name, FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN, &new_entry_name ) ) )
00274     {
00275       cache_status = CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00276     } 
00277   else
00278     {
00279       /*
00280        * Lookup file to see if new entry exists
00281        *
00282        */
00283       should_not_exists =  cache_inode_lookup( new_parent_pentry, 
00284                                                &new_entry_name, 
00285                                                &tst_attr,
00286                                                ht,
00287                                                pclient,
00288                                                pcontext, 
00289                                                &cache_status );
00290       
00291       if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND )
00292         {
00293           /* We need to lookup over the old entry also */
00294           should_exists = cache_inode_lookup( parent_pentry,
00295                                               &entry_name, 
00296                                               &tst_attr,
00297                                               ht, 
00298                                               pclient,
00299                                               pcontext, 
00300                                               &cache_status );
00301           
00302           /* Rename entry */
00303           if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00304             cache_inode_rename( parent_pentry, 
00305                                 &entry_name, 
00306                                 new_parent_pentry,
00307                                 &new_entry_name, 
00308                                 &attr, 
00309                                 &new_attr, 
00310                                 ht, 
00311                                 pclient, 
00312                                 pcontext, 
00313                                 &cache_status ) ;
00314           
00315           
00316           if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00317             {
00318               switch( preq->rq_vers )
00319                 {
00320                 case NFS_V2:
00321                   pres->res_stat2 = NFS_OK;
00322                   break;
00323 
00324                 case NFS_V3:
00325                   /*
00326                    * Build Weak Cache Coherency
00327                    * data 
00328                    */
00329                   nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00330                                   parent_pentry, 
00331                                   ppre_attr, 
00332                                   &attr, 
00333                                   &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resok.fromdir_wcc) );
00334                   
00335                   nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00336                                   new_parent_pentry, 
00337                                   pnew_pre_attr,
00338                                   &new_attr,
00339                                   &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resok.todir_wcc));
00340                   
00341                   pres->res_rename3.status = NFS3_OK;
00342                   break;
00343                   
00344                 }
00345               
00346               return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00347             }
00348         }
00349       else
00350         {
00351           /* If name are the same (basically renaming a/file1 to a/file1, this is a non-erroneous situation to be managed */
00352           if( new_parent_pentry == parent_pentry )
00353             {
00354               if( !FSAL_namecmp( &new_entry_name, &entry_name ) )
00355                 {
00356                   /* trying to rename a file to himself, this is allowed */
00357                   cache_status = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00358                   switch( preq->rq_vers )
00359                     {
00360                     case NFS_V2:
00361                       pres->res_stat2 = NFS_OK;
00362                       break;
00363                       
00364                     case NFS_V3:
00365                       /*
00366                        * Build Weak Cache Coherency
00367                        * data 
00368                        */
00369                       nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00370                                       parent_pentry, 
00371                                       ppre_attr, 
00372                                       &attr, 
00373                                       &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resok.fromdir_wcc) );
00374                       
00375                       nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00376                                       parent_pentry, 
00377                                       ppre_attr,
00378                                       &attr,
00379                                       &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resok.todir_wcc));
00380                       
00381                       pres->res_rename3.status = NFS3_OK;
00382                       break;
00383                       
00384                     }
00385                   
00386                   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00387                 }
00388               
00389             }
00390 
00391           /* New entry already exists. In this case (see RFC), entry should be compatible: Both are non-directories or 
00392            * both are directories and 'todir' is empty. If compatible, old 'todir' entry is scratched, if not returns EEXISTS */
00393           if( should_not_exists != NULL )
00394             {
00395               /* We need to lookup over the old entry also */
00396               if( ( should_exists = cache_inode_lookup( parent_pentry,
00397                                                         &entry_name, 
00398                                                         &tst_attr,
00399                                                         ht, 
00400                                                         pclient,
00401                                                         pcontext, 
00402                                                         &cache_status ) ) != NULL )
00403                 {
00404                   if( cache_inode_type_are_rename_compatible( should_exists, should_not_exists ) )
00405                     {
00406                       /* Remove the old entry before renaming it */
00407                       if( cache_inode_remove( new_parent_pentry, 
00408                                               &new_entry_name, 
00409                                               &tst_attr, 
00410                                               ht, 
00411                                               pclient, 
00412                                               pcontext,
00413                                               &cache_status ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00414                         {
00415                           if( cache_inode_rename( parent_pentry, 
00416                                                   &entry_name, 
00417                                                   new_parent_pentry,
00418                                                   &new_entry_name, 
00419                                                   &attr, 
00420                                                   &new_attr, 
00421                                                   ht, 
00422                                                   pclient, 
00423                                                   pcontext, 
00424                                                   &cache_status ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00425                             {
00426                               /* trying to rename a file to himself, this is allowed */
00427                               switch( preq->rq_vers )
00428                                 {
00429                                 case NFS_V2:
00430                                   pres->res_stat2 = NFS_OK;
00431                                   break;
00432                                   
00433                                 case NFS_V3:
00434                                   /*
00435                                    * Build Weak Cache Coherency
00436                                    * data 
00437                                    */
00438                                   nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00439                                                   parent_pentry, 
00440                                                   ppre_attr, 
00441                                                   &attr, 
00442                                                   &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resok.fromdir_wcc) );
00443                                   
00444                                   nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00445                                                   parent_pentry, 
00446                                                   ppre_attr,
00447                                                   &attr,
00448                                                   &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resok.todir_wcc));
00449                                   
00450                                   pres->res_rename3.status = NFS3_OK;
00451                                   break;
00452                                   
00453                                 }
00454                               
00455                               return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00456                             }
00457                         }
00458                       
00459                     }
00460                 } /*  if( cache_inode_type_are_rename_compatible( should_exists, should_not_exists ) ) */
00461             } /* if( ( should_exists = cache_inode_lookup( parent_pentry, .... */
00462 
00463           /* If this point is reached, then destination object already exists with that name in the directory 
00464              and types are not compatible, we should return that the file exists */
00465           cache_status =  CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS ;
00466         } /* if( should_not_exists != NULL ) */
00467     }
00468   
00469         /* If we are here, there was an error */
00470         if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status ) )
00471         {
00472                 return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00473         }
00474   
00475         nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00476                        preq->rq_vers, 
00477                        cache_status,
00478                        &pres->res_stat2,
00479                        &pres->res_rename3.status,
00480                        NULL, NULL,
00481                        parent_pentry, 
00482                        ppre_attr,
00483                        &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resfail.fromdir_wcc),
00484                        new_parent_pentry,
00485                        pnew_pre_attr,
00486                        &(pres->res_rename3.RENAME3res_u.resfail.todir_wcc));
00487   
00488         return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00489   
00490 } /* nfs_Rename */
00491

00501 void nfs_Rename_Free( nfs_res_t * resp )
00502 {
00503   /* Nothing to do here */
00504   return ;
00505 } /* nfs_Rename_Free */
